Uses of Class
org.hps.readout.TriggerDriver

  • Packages that use TriggerDriver 
    Package Description
    org.hps.readout

    • Uses of TriggerDriver in org.hps.readout

      Methods in org.hps.readout with parameters of type TriggerDriver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ReadoutDataManager.registerTrigger(TriggerDriver triggerDriver)
      Registers a trigger driver with the data manager.
      (package private) static void ReadoutDataManager.sendTrigger(TriggerDriver driver)
      Indicates that the specified driver saw a trigger and readout should occur.
      (package private) static void ReadoutDataManager.sendTrigger(TriggerDriver driver, String triggerType)
      Indicates that the specified driver saw a trigger and readout should occur.
      (package private) static void ReadoutDataManager.sendTrigger(TriggerDriver driver, String triggerType, String topBot)
      Indicates that the specified driver saw a trigger and readout should occur.

    • Uses of TriggerDriver in org.hps.readout.trigger

      Subclasses of TriggerDriver in org.hps.readout.trigger 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HodoscopeStudiesTriggerReadoutDriver
      HodoscopeStudiesTriggerReadoutDriver is a simple trigger that is intended for use in hodoscope trigger studies.
      class  PairTriggerReadoutDriver 
      class  PulserReadoutDriver
      Class PulserReadoutDriver automatically sends a trigger on every nth event, where n is a definable value.

      PulserReadoutDriver does not support method setDeadTime(int), as its rate is defined entirely via the pulse rate.
      class  SinglesTriggerReadoutDriver
      SinglesTriggerReadoutDriver simulates an HPS singles trigger.

    • Uses of TriggerDriver in org.hps.readout.trigger2019

      Subclasses of TriggerDriver in org.hps.readout.trigger2019 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FEETrigger2019ReadoutDriver
      FEETrigger2019ReadoutDriver simulates an HPS FEE trigger for 2019 MC.
      class  PairsTrigger2019ReadoutDriver
      PairsTrigger2019ReadoutDriver simulates an HPS pairs trigger for 2019 MC.
      class  SinglesTrigger2019ReadoutDriver
      SinglesTrigger2019ReadoutDriver simulates an HPS singles trigger for 2019 MC.
